Interfaces

Interface ChunkserverInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChunkServer

    public interface ChunkserverInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Use this interface to connect to the Chunkservers.

    Methods from this interface are called by the Master, Clients, and other Chunkservers.

    Methods called by the Master:
    • void connectToMaser()
    • void connectToClient(Integer)
    • void connectToChunkserver(Integer)
    • void primaryLease(String, List)
    • boolean createFile(String)
    • boolean createDirectory(String)
    • boolean deleteFile(String)
    • boolean deleteDirectory(String)
    • void fetchAndRewrite(String, int)
    • void heartbeat()
    Methods called by Clients:
    • void connectToClient(Integer)
    • boolean atomicAppend(String, byte[], int, boolean)
    • byte[] read(String, int, int)
    • byte[] readCompletely(String)
    • boolean append(String, byte[], int, int, boolean)
    • byte[] numFiles(String)
    Methods called by Chunkservers:
    • void setupChunkserverHost()
    • void connectToMaser()
    • boolean deleteFile(String)
    • byte[] read(String, int, int)
    • boolean append(String, byte[], int, int, boolean)
    • boolean atomicAppendSecondary(String, byte[], int, boolean, long)
    • byte[] readCompletely(String)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean append(java.lang.String chunkhandle, byte[] payload, int length, int offset, boolean withSize)
      Writes at a specified offset in a specified file and updates CSMetadata if successful
      boolean atomicAppend(java.lang.String chunkhandle, byte[] payload, int length, boolean withSize)
      Writes to the end of a specified file and updates CSMetadata if successful
      boolean atomicAppendSecondary(java.lang.String chunkhandle, byte[] payload, int length, boolean withSize, long offset)
      Writes to the end of a specified file and updates CSMetadata if successful
      void connectToChunkserver(java.lang.Integer id)
      Attempts to establish the RMI connection to a specified Chunkserver
      void connectToClient(java.lang.Integer id)
      Attempts to establish RMI connection to a specified Client
      void connectToMaster()
      Attempts to establish RMI connection to Master
      boolean createDirectory(java.lang.String chunkhandle)
      Creates a directory in the chunkserver and updates CSMetadata if successful
      boolean createFile(java.lang.String chunkhandle)
      Creates a file in the chunkserver and updates CSMetadata if successful
      boolean deleteDirectory(java.lang.String chunkhandle)
      Deletes a directory in the chunkserver and updates CSMetadata if successful
      boolean deleteFile(java.lang.String chunkhandle)
      Deletes a file in the chunkserver and updates CSMetadata if successful
      void fetchAndRewrite(java.lang.String chunkhandle, int sourceID)
      Updates file data from another Chunkserver
      void heartbeat()
      Messages the Master with its Chunkserver ID
      byte[] numFiles(java.lang.String chunkhandle)
      Returns the number of separate payloads in a specified file with the haystack format
      void primaryLease(java.lang.String chunkhandle, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> CServers)
      Sets CSMetadata primary lease times as well as appropriate secondary ChunkServers
      byte[] read(java.lang.String chunkhandle, int offset, int length)
      Reads from a specified offset in a specified file
      byte[] readCompletely(java.lang.String chunkhandle)
      Reads an entire specified file
      void setupChunkserverHost()
      Attempts to establish the RMI connection to all other Chunkservers

                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      • primaryLease

        void primaryLease(java.lang.String chunkhandle,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> CServers)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets CSMetadata primary lease times as well as appropriate secondary ChunkServers
        Parameters:
        chunkhandle - full path of the file
        CServers - list of secondary Chunkserver IDs
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • createFile

        boolean createFile(java.lang.String chunkhandle)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creates a file in the chunkserver and updates CSMetadata if successful
        Parameters:
        chunkhandle - full path of the file
        Returns:
        true if and only if the operation succeeded; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • fetchAndRewrite

        void fetchAndRewrite(java.lang.String chunkhandle,
                   int sourceID)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Updates file data from another Chunkserver
        Parameters:
        chunkhandle - full path of the directory
        sourceID - ID of the Chunkserver used to update the data
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • heartbeat

        void heartbeat()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Messages the Master with its Chunkserver ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • atomicAppend

        boolean atomicAppend(java.lang.String chunkhandle,
                   byte[] payload,
                   int length,
                   boolean withSize)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Writes to the end of a specified file and updates CSMetadata if successful
        Parameters:
        chunkhandle - full path of the file
        payload - data to be written to the file
        length - length of the file
        withSize - if true - expect byte array with haystack format; if false - byte array is only payload
        Returns:
        true if and only if the operation succeeded; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • read

        byte[] read(java.lang.String chunkhandle,
          int offset,
          int length)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Reads from a specified offset in a specified file
        Parameters:
        chunkhandle - full path of the file
        offset - offset in file at which to begin read
        length - length of the file
        Returns:
        true if and only if the operation succeeded; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • append

        boolean append(java.lang.String chunkhandle,
             byte[] payload,
             int length,
             int offset,
             boolean withSize)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Writes at a specified offset in a specified file and updates CSMetadata if successful
        Parameters:
        chunkhandle - full path of the file
        payload - data to be written to the file
        length - length of the file
        offset - offset in file at which to begin write
        withSize - if true - expect byte array with haystack format; if false - byte array is only payload
        Returns:
        true if and only if the operation succeeded; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
